title: Has Tesla thought about building any Electric Motorcycles? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a great idea for Tesla ever build electric motorcycles, as of Gold-Mine market with Tesla new battery. If Tesla do so; with 25KWh. battery for under $20,000 for 250 miles range, as on one ever has it. 250 freeway miles range as up to 400 around town miles. Both ZERO and Harley Davison Live Wire will be dead with too short range. With new battery, Tesla motor boats for hours of fun.

That space is already occupied  Besides, Elon Musk doesn’t want to do a road bike We’ll aim to have it come out same time as truck. Two seater electric ATV designed to work with Cybertruck will be fun! Electric dirt bikes would be cool too. We won’t do road bikes, as too dangerous. I was hit by a truck & almost died on one when I was 17.— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) December 8, 2019
